channel.title: Boxing
channel.description: Is there level 3 boxing in RS2?

item.title: Boxing
item.dc:creator: @slava slava
item.description:
@slava wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:6, topic:429825”][quote author=slava link=topic=532508.msg3892830#msg3892830 date=1327034610]

Ah fuck…Forgot that it doesn’t have fatigue. They should add a way to lock your exp.

Ehh, may not be far off, they look like a private server now as it is with the crappy new interfaces.

I couldn’t agree more. I saw the new interface and it completely turned me off…
[/quote]
The old interface turned you on?[/quote]
no, it just had its own unique look. now it just looks like all of the other online games that exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:9, topic:429825"][quote author=the elve age link=topic=532508.msg3893004#msg3893004 date=1327063652]

If ANYTHING their 2006-2007 era turned me on. And I’ve heard so much about boxing now, what is it?
[/quote]No weapons/armor stake, and its been around since 05.

…It’s been around since classic. -.-[/quote]I didn’t say it originated in 05 :P, just the first time I noticed it was the release of Duel Arena

Read full topic
